original_text: Now Joseph was governor over the land. He was the one who sold to all the people of the land. And Joseph's brothers came and bowed themselves before him with their faces to the ground.
korean_text: 때에 요셉이 나라의 총리로서 그 땅 모든 백성에게 곡식을 팔더니 요셉의 형들이 와서 그 앞에서 땅에 엎드려 절하매

sentences.original_text: Now Joseph was governor over the land.
He was the one who sold to all the people of the land.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 땅의 모든 백성에게 곡식을 파는 사람이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: with their faces to the ground.
